plot outline: 26 November 2008 things are going fine in Mumbai as usual in everyone's daily life around 08:00 pm locals near sea coast of Colaba noted around 24 young men with huge bag packs coming from speedboats.The locals tried to inquire but they men asked them to mind their own work and divided them in tow ways ,the locals did inform the nearby police station who did not take any action.Few hours later around 09:30 pm sounds of bullets started pouring at CST station causing huge destruction to human life,further which caused damage at Taj Palace,Trident Hotel,Cama Hospital,Leopold Cafe and Nariman House where sounds of bullets could be heard everywhere and everyone realized it was one of the worst terrorist attack.People started running for their lives and could see blood everywhere many loosing their dear ones right in front of them by the time the cops came in action severe damage was already done.But during a blockade the cops got the news that two terrorists are eloping in a car towards Girgaon Chowpathy in the bloodbath between the cops and terrorists Tukaram Ombale managed to get hold of one of the terrorists Ajmal Qasab but cost his life for him.The same night saw the Mumbai police department lost three top cops in the terrorist attack.The attacks continued for next three days in Mumbai until NSG commandos manage to overcome all the terrorists while the only surviving terrorist Qasab was tried in court.
title: The Attacks of 26/11
akas: The Attacks of 26th November (World-wide, English title)
plot: The real story of ten terrorists, who sail to Mumbai and wage war on the populace for the next 72 hours.

26 November 2008 things are going fine in Mumbai as usual in everyone's daily life around 08:00 pm locals near sea coast of Colaba noted around 24 young men with huge bag packs coming from speedboats.The locals tried to inquire but they men asked them to mind their own work and divided them in tow ways ,the locals did inform the nearby police station who did not take any action.Few hours later around 09:30 pm sounds of bullets started pouring at CST station causing huge destruction to human life,further which caused damage at Taj Palace,Trident Hotel,Cama Hospital,Leopold Cafe and Nariman House where sounds of bullets could be heard everywhere and everyone realized it was one of the worst terrorist attack.People started running for their lives and could see blood everywhere many loosing their dear ones right in front of them by the time the cops came in action severe damage was already done.But during a blockade the cops got the news that two terrorists are eloping in a car towards Girgaon Chowpathy in the bloodbath between the cops and terrorists Tukaram Ombale managed to get hold of one of the terrorists Ajmal Qasab but cost his life for him.The same night saw the Mumbai police department lost three top cops in the terrorist attack.The attacks continued for next three days in Mumbai until NSG commandos manage to overcome all the terrorists while the only surviving terrorist Qasab was tried in court.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
